allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Zapdesk Lightning tipping widget

- React-based Bitcoin Lightning tipping widget for Zendesk Help Center
- Dynamic QR code generation with real Lightning invoices
- Configurable tip amounts (100, 1000, 10,000 sats)
- Integration with Wallet of Satoshi
- Production build ready for deployment

Built with React, Vite, and Lightning Network APIs
EOF
)")
